main event: An airman observed a silver object hovering motionless for 8 minutes before it rolled on its side and disappeared.
interesting points: The sighting occurred at Manston, England at 2336Z on 10 Oct 52., The object was silver and glittering., The observation lasted for 8 minutes., No sound was heard during the sighting., Another report indicated a larger disc-shaped object seen by RAF pilots near Manston on 6 Oct 52 performing high-speed maneuvers.
